::Scrapper::
"I swear, we would be so farther ahead without him.  Hoist, should 
one of us go speak with Havotron?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Scavenger::
> 
> Scavenger looks down at what he has in his hand, but before he can 
explain, he hears Hook and Scrapper. He looks between the two of them.
> 
> "Right. That's what I was looking for."
> 
> Turning around, he walks back out of the room, searching for the 
hyperdrive.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > ::Scrapper/Dreadwing/Needlenose/Havotron::
> > Scrapper smiled. "He will never find waht we need, he is useless 
as 
> > always."
> > 
> > Dreadwing did not find it funny.  "We must finish soon, the 
Autobots 
> > prepare to leave and you sit around making jokes. Havotron will 
be 
> > displeased."
> > 
> > Needlenose looked to Spinister then to Havotron. Not knowing what 
to 
> > do he to bowed but did not say a thing.
> > 
> > Havotron smiled. "Ah yes, another weapon master to join us.  
Please 
> > walk with me you to." 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> > > Hook nodded. "It is comming along nicely, and will give us the 
> > speed we
> > > need," he then turned disgustedly at Scavanger, "If we could 
ever 
> > find
> > > our hyper drive." he said impatiently.
> > > ______________________________________________________
> > > Spinister silently moved aside, to show Needlenose, he then 
bowed.
